column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////On a positive note
column2: there's a parking garage around the corner that's for free
column3: it seems to be busy at any hour but they do seat you fast. This probably the only ramen place I've been too where they took a good while to give you your ramen and the happy hour ends at 5pm...5pm. We work 8-5 so of course we missed it but no fret
column4: go next door to the pizza place for good happy hour specials!
